alert.note: Alert for Crane; Ector; Midland; Upton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 27 at 11:14PM CDT until October 27 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Midland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Ector County in western Texas... Southwestern Midland County in western Texas... Northeastern Crane County in western Texas... Northwestern Upton County in western Texas... * Until 1145 PM CDT. * At 1113 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles southeast of West Odessa, or 12 miles south of Odessa, moving east-northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Pleasant Farms. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
